Back to Dmitri Shostakovich

Dmitri Shostakovich

Theme and Variations in B-flat major, op. 3a

c. 1921–1922

The theme is followed by eleven variations, a finale and a coda. The variations exist in two versions: one for orchestra (op. 3) and one for solo piano (op. 3a).

Recommended editions

  • New Collected Works (DSCH Publishers) · Volume 109 · ed. Victor Ekimovsky

Duration: 17'

Difficulty: 4.5
